note.previous: Idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, ito bhavaṃ mūlaphalāni bhuñjatu’’
So maṃ patitvā sahasājjhapatto, panujja maṃ abbahi
Gambhīrarūpo te vaṇo salohito, apūtiko vaṇagandho
mantayogā na kasāyayogā, na osadhā brahmacāri

note.original: yaṃ te mudu tena (sī.), yaṃ te mudū tena (pī.)

note.previous: Ito nu bhoto katamena assamo, kacci bhavaṃ abhiramasi
ujuṃ uttarāyaṃ disāyaṃ, khemānadī himavatā pabhāvī
Bhinnāni kaṭṭhāni huto ca aggi, tapanīpi te samitā brahmacārī
Pīṭhañca mayhaṃ udakañca hoti, ramasi tuvaṃ
Na mikhalaṃ muñjamayaṃ dhāreti, na santhare
Paṅko ca tassa bhusadassaneyyo, netādiso yādiso mayhaṃ kāye
Na nūna so hanti dume kuṭhāriyā
Na majja mantā paṭibhanti tāta, na aggihuttaṃ napi yaññatantaṃ
tuvaṃ dakkhasi brahmacāriṃ, sace tuvaṃ sallape
Puññā vidhaṃse amaro na camhi, jano ca me pāpamidañca
Sammohitā vāpi sukhena mattā, na pāpakammañca
Dāso ahaṃ tuyha saputtadāro, yathāsukhaṃ sāmi
Tuvaṃ nu seṭṭho tvamanuttarosi, tvaṃ dhammagū
Asappurisadhammo so, yo bhajantaṃ na bhajjati
Kālena yācaṃ yāceyya, evaṃ mittā na jīyare
Attano ce hi vādassa, aparādhaṃ vijāniyā
Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchanti, nette jimhaṃ
Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ
